title: History
desc: From ancient times to the present day, Japan has cultivated a unique culture and traditions. The Sengoku period, the Edo period, and the Meiji Restoration are just some of its fascinating historical eras.

title: Culture
desc: Tea ceremony, flower arrangement, festivals, and kimono—Japan's beautiful culture and traditions, rooted in a long history, are still alive today.

title: Food
desc: Sushi, tempura, ramen, and wagashi—Japan's culinary culture is loved all over the world.Regional specialties from Hokkaido to Okinawa offer endless flavors to explore, each telling a unique story of the area.
